data.title: Top 40 Barn and ranch Wedding Venues in Summitville, IN
data.meta_description: Find your perfect barn and ranch wedding venues in Summitville, IN at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your venue search in minutes.
data.text:
Nestled back in the Hamilton Proper neighborhood The Hawthorns Country Club is conveniently located near 116th and Brookschool road. Our Nantucket feel clubhouse will lend itself to serve as a beautiful backdrop for family photos and canvas worth prints of couples. Choose from our natural green space ceremony complete with chairs and arbor or upgrade to our paved patio that includes a beautiful white arbor and ceremony chairs overlooking the 18th hole of our luscious golf course.

Pictures do not do this beautiful venue justice. The barn is all made out of cedar which just takes your breath away with the antique chandeliers and twinkling lights. Step into this charming climate controlled barn with beautiful barn doors that open up to trees everywhere with lights on them. Located on 10 acres of land with pond in back for picture taking. Service at your mercy. Decor to choose from. Linens tables chairs bartender all included. Day of wedding coordinator just so much to included! Stress free wedding is what we focus on!!!! Staff, linens, dishes, bartender, parking attendant, decor all included!!!!

Woodlands | Wildflowers | Whimsy. A charming English Garden Venue. The Enchanted Cottage has a Jane Austen Vibe. The Village Venue attached by a European style courtyard is light/bright and has mood lighting. The Cottage & The Village Venue combine for a village feel experience. If you're looking for something you don't often see. Maybe this is where your fairytale should be written.

Jones Crossing is a family owned business that started in 2007. We host indoor and outdoor ceremonies and indoor receptions. We have our own catering company, Grafton Peek Catering, that has been with us for 16 years. Every event is a custom event at Jones Crossing. We want to know and understand your visions for your wedding day and help make them happen for you.

Marvin's Pass Weddings is privately owned and operated. PLEASE FIND OUR WEBSITE AND MESSAGE US PRIVATELY (MARVINSPASS.COM) AS WE DO NOT PAY FOR ADVERTISING ON SITES TO KEEP THE COST DOWN FOR OUR CLIENTS! Our dedicated team of wedding planners and coordinators work together with our network of vendors in California, Florida and Indiana regularly, ensuring nothing but perfection on your special day. Whether our client is already in contract with a venue, needs assistance finding a venue, or simply dreams of a beach wedding - WE CAN HELP! In addition, Marvin's Pass of Indiana shares our rustic outdoor venue with our clients that is perfect for your dream wedding. Situated on approximately 6 acres of a secluded atmosphere, you will feel the peace and tranquility seldom found anywhere else. In addition to our peaceful outdoor ceremony space, we offer a barn to house personalized decorations, custom bar and indoor restrooms. A beautifully lit tent area is also provided for dinner service.

Begin your wedding planning with heavenly expectations! The Lodge at Purgatory Golf Club offers a beautiful lodge-style clubhouse surrounded by our 218 acre golf course located just north of downtown Noblesville, IN. The natural Indiana landscape makes for a memorable event, regardless the time of year. The Reception Hall features a warm, rustic setting with high beam ceilings, accented by a large river stone fireplace. The adjoining lounge, The Confessional, has a fully stocked bar, comfortable chairs and couches that surround another large river stone fireplace. The connecting wrap-around patio offers spectacular golf course views for sunset pictures.

Our heartfelt desire is to provide an affordable and classic wedding venue that is limited only by your imagination. Every decision we have made has been to provide the best wedding experience for you. Our goal is to replace wedding stress with wedding joy. Your wedding day should be filled with love and family, not stress. We provide a large selection of quality decorations, many donated by previous brides to pay it forward. We like to believe the love transfers with them. You simply make an appointment with an experienced designer and a few months before your wedding, create your tablescape and choose your decor. The week of your wedding, we ask for those photos and everything will be readily available for you to begin creating your dream. Brides tell us it helps reduce day-of stress. We focused on every minute detail in building because those details add up to something beautiful. We would love to meet you and begin bringing your wedding vision to life!

Madison Rose Event Center at Black Creek Ridge Flower Farm is a unique, enchanting venue nestled within the picturesque surroundings of a beautiful flower farm. We offer the perfect blend of rustic charm and natural beauty. With elegant decor and a stunning outdoor ceremony area, you will be surrounded by abundant flowers and botanicals. With its tranquil ambiance and scenic backdrop, Madison Rose at Black Creek Ridge Flower Farm creates a magical setting for unforgettable celebrations. We’ve been told we’re the best kept secret in northern Indiana and a true hidden gem!

The Gala Barn is a nostalgic 1800's barn set on rustic farm property in Fountain County, Indiana, a charming setting for couples to share their wedding day and celebration with family and friends. The Gala Barn schedules one wedding a weekend, with our wedding parties able to use the Gala Barn Friday morning to Sunday morning to prepare for the ceremony and reception as they would like. The Gala Barn allows couples to use the vendors they would like and provides amenities at no additional cost. Parking accommodations, two restrooms, 300 chairs, more than 40 tables, and various decorations are provided. A bar location, serving table, and refrigerator are available. The Gala Barn has more than 4500 sq. ft. of space on three levels with a suggested capacity of 250 with fans and heat. The Gala Barn has an attached deck leading to a private room in the silo, a walkout patio, and several locations for outside ceremonies. The Gala Barn is an old fashioned setting for new beginnings.

Welcome to Whitetail Tree Farm. Looking for that perfect venue? You have come to the right place. Our farm is nestled among the hills of scenic Henry County, Indiana. We are situated in a picturesque part of Indiana. Your first experience when entering our farm is the feeling of peace and tranquility. The beauty and vastness of our farm is instantly charming. The surrounding lawns offer a number of places to hold a gorgeous outdoor wedding with several spectacular choices for photographs. The location for your wedding is an important choice in making your special day memorable. Whitetail Tree Farm takes pride in making "Memories that Last Forever" with our personalized attention. We invite you to take a tour of our unique farm. Come see all we have to offer in making your wedding one to remember.

White Diamond Lavender Farms is a 10 acre lavender farm situated in the heart of the midwest just outside of the surprising little town of Hope, IN.​ We are a seasonal U-Pick lavender farm and event venue. Our property boasts a 7600 square foot barn. Our barn is newly remodeled with a 460 square foot wrap around front porch up-cycled from century old barn beams from Salem, IN. Our venue space inside the barn is home to our White Diamond Chandelier that has 8000 crystals. It is adorned with thousands of twinkle lights, and draped with lightweight gossamer fabric.

The Lodge at River Valley Farm opened in the Fall of 2015 and was once a real working farm in the 1940’s for descendants of the Ball (yes, Ball jar!) family. The Lodge has been uniquely restored into a private sanctuary to host your dream wedding. Located in quaint Yorktown, Indiana, The Lodge sits on fifty acres surrounded by farm fields and woods, yet just a few miles from bustling Muncie. The property still houses the beautifully restored farmhouse from the 1850’s with all the modern amenities to fit in to a busy bride’s day of readiness. Located just a mere sidewalk away is the 5,000 square foot masterpiece fully enclosed space, The Lodge.

Meet The Wilds, Southern Indiana's most sought after wedding and event venue! If you are looking for a sophisticated, private wedding venue with all of the amenities, you are in the right place. The Wilds is conveniently located minutes from Bloomington and Brown County and only a short drive from Indianapolis, Indiana. Inspired by modern farmhouses and designed with second-to-none client experiences in mind. The Wilds provides hand-crafted, luxury weddings within reach. After all, a 5 star venue doesn’t just serve as a backdrop- it sets your wedding apart. ⁣You are wildly original. Your wedding should be no less. For transparent pricing, inclusions and availability, or to conveniently book a private tour, please visit us at⁣ www.THEWILDSVENUE.com.

Lakeside Occasions is a family-owned wedding barn in the heart of northern Indiana's Amish country. Our historic dairy barn was built in the late 1880's and has been in the family ever since! We call it "The Guernsey" in reference to the type of cows that were milked there. The barn is nestled between picturesque farmland on a peaceful lake in a small village known as Emma.

Nestled off the back roads in a secluded Brown County valley sits the perfect venue to celebrate your special day or event. Built in the late 1800’s, The Old Barn at Brown County has been restored with new flooring, romantic chandelier lighting and convenient onsite restrooms, all while maintaining its original rustic-charm. The barn provides 3,800 square feet of multi-functional space, beautiful views and privacy. The classic and simple lines of the barn allow you to create and design your own unique event no matter what your style. In addition to the barn, the Big Easy Log Cabin is also located on the property. The newly renovated 4 bedroom, 3.5 bath cabin is the perfect size for you and your overnight accommodations. The 1880’s hand-hewed log cabin includes a wonderful wrap-around porch, sufficient get ready space, and a game room for you and your guests to enjoy. An additional 4 bedroom cabin up the hill (Over Easy) is available to rent as well.

Montgomery Creek Ranch is home to Boondocks Event Barn & Lodge. Our 160-acre ranch is the perfect event venue to host your private wedding oasis. Hold your ceremony on the meadow with wildflowers as your backdrop or in front of the stone fireplace in the event barn. Create a wedding weekend with family and close friends by staying at The Lodge. The love of beauty in the outdoors and the values it instills in the family led Denise Peacock to share this property with others to make cherished special occasions with their own family and friends. We are thrilled to share the beautiful Venue with you. Denise, her husband Joe, and their family welcome you and your family to Montgomery Creek Ranch.

Highpoint Events in Greensburg, Indiana redefines the concept of a "one of a kind" event venue. This 15-acre apple orchard turned event venue features multiple newly renovated indoor and outdoor locations, 1400 fruit trees, a pumpkin patch, sunflower gardens, and an 1858-built homestead, all overlooking a 45-acre reservoir. Conveniently located just a two-minute drive from the nearest hotel, Highpoint's 15-acre estate blends its scenic rural settings with a wide variety of modern amenities. Beautifully renovated 300-person indoor facility featuring updated restrooms, a commercial staging kitchen, windows & double doors throughout, hardwood floors, dimmable lighting, and 5000 square feet of outdoor entertainment space overlooking a 45-acre reservoir. Tenting available for events over 300 guests.

They say your wedding day is one of the most important days of your life. So when our oldest daughter told us she was engaged it was all about making it a day they would remember. The challenge started...finding a venue that would accent this memorable day. It came to a great surprise to us that there was a lack of beautiful outdoor venues. That is where the dream for Hidden Hollow Farm began.

Let our beautiful property including a 3+ acre lake, timber views, water tower, gorgeous outdoor ceremony space and Pinterest-worthy barn make your photographers job easy. Relax while our trained staff cares for you, your friends, family, and guests so that you can all enjoy every special moment together. Our Venue Features: ~Heating + Air Conditioning ~Fire pit, Stocked wood, Smore station ~Indoor + Outdoor Ceremony Options ~Exclusivity of the Property all Day (8a-11p) ~Bridal/Groom Suites with private bathrooms ~Photo Booth Room with Fun Props ~Tables, Chairs, Linens, + Vintage Décor ~Ample warmly-lit Parking Lot ~3+ acre Stocked Lake (Groomsmen are welcome to fish during the morning) ~Planning Portal ~In-House Options for DJ, Videographer, Photographer, Catering, Shuttle, and Day-Of Coordinator.

A destination in your own backyard. Be captivated by a sophisticated country-style retreat for your wedding. Experience picture perfect views with vibrant nature inspired backdrops where we turn your special day into an unforgettable getaway! Truly Unique Barn Venue. Built in 2018, a state-of-the-art facility set in the woods of Putnam County Indiana. Many of the timbers used to construct the barn came from clearing the property to build the barn. With over 14,000 square feet of indoor conditioned space and 6000 square feet of outdoor space you have the flexibility to create your perfect event.

The Blossom Barn is a historical farm built in 1832 by the Steckel family. It was once a state of the art dairy farm. They sold Steckel Dairy products. The dairy barn was one of many barns and outbuildings here on the 100+ acres. The original dairy barn burned down and this one we restored was built in the early 1900's. We were able to restore all of these buildings on the property, the dairy barn, the white livestock barn, milk-house, chicken coop and the two silos attached to the dairy barn. Our venue is truly one of a kind, unlike any other venue around! From the exposed brick, many windows with natural light, exposed beams to the elegant chandeliers & Bride/Groom suites in the silos you are sure to feel the intimate romance and nostalgic ambiance here at the Blossom Barn🖤

Built in 1879 our tobacco barn is the perfect venue for you beautiful rustic wedding. The Guthrie Mansion is situated next to the wedding barn and the exterior can be used for one of several ceremony locations. There is a bridal room and cabin rentals available for bride and guests. There are 2 floors in the wedding barn, a bar, prep kitchen area and dance floor as well as a beautiful large deck overlooking 125 acres of beautiful property.

Our restored, temperature controlled barn sits on 110 acres of beautiful Brown County countryside and provides an idyllic setting for weddings and special events. Included on the property is a beautifully restored historic cabin. Mount Liberty Farms is just 15 minutes from Columbus, Indiana and 10 minutes from the town of Nashville. Our Barn is perfect for intimate weddings and events with 50-100 guests. Or fill the barn to the max with up to 130+ guests. Tables, chairs and our decor are included in every wedding package. We like to think of our farm as an escape from it all and a place to connect, unwind and gather with those you love the most. At Mount Liberty Farms, we believe in community. We believe that our historic venue can play a role in bringing people together and celebrating the joys in life. Because, isn't that what it is all about?

The Loft on Isanogel is one of the oldest barns in the area, beautifully restored. Once the home of Camp Isanogel, a summer camp for those with special needs, The Loft is a source of history and pride for the owners, Harry and Karen Holding. They raised their children just around the corner from the summer camp and enjoyed driving by and seeing the joy and hearing the laughter from the children at the camp throughout the many years the camp was in business. They are beyond happy to now see the smiles from the happy couples who have chosen to say their “I dos” on this one-of-a-kind, breathtaking property.

The Stables offers amazing indoor and outdoor space that can be transformed into any style or design. The venue is totally secluded on a 40-acre horse farm. Your guest will be amazed and feel right at home in the temperature controlled indoor space. They will enjoy sitting on the covered patio and enjoying the views. We offer your choice between two outdoor wedding sites. The wedding party can enjoy getting ready onsite in our private suites.

The Legacy Barn is located just 6 miles west of downtown Kokomo and secluded on 10 acres of countryside property, this gorgeous wedding venue will take your breath away! Imagine your perfect wedding day outdoors, or inside our beautiful rustic barn. We offer multiple wedding packages to accommodate your wedding day! Enjoy a single day, or the whole weekend Friday, Saturday and Sunday! Relax in your private Bridal Suite for the Bride and bridesmaids, and The Bullpen for the Groomsmen with a secret cigar lounge included. Save hundreds to thousands of dollars with our amazing room Full of decorations free for all of our Legacy couples to use! Let us take all the stress away with our built in Day of Directing and Wedding Coordinating Services to make sure that your special day runs perfectly smooth! You will love every second of your time spent with us at The Legacy Barn!

Situated in the heartland of Indiana, conveniently positioned between Ft. Wayne and Indianapolis, Bliss Barn offers a charming backdrop for any memorable celebration. Surrounded by tranquil scenery and a relaxed atmosphere, this venue warmly welcomes you and your guests to an inviting and elegant setting, promising a day filled with joy and cherished moments. Step into the possibilities as you explore our property, discovering how each space transforms to fulfill the dreams of your wedding day. Our 5 acre property includes Bliss Barn, 3 ceremonial locations and Bliss House that can accommodate up to 12 guests for your special weekend.

This is an elegant country wedding venue, perfect for any bride. The beauty of The Loft At Walnut Hill Farm, LLC. is that in one location, couples may host both an indoor or outdoor ceremony followed by a reception. The venue has a Dutch Hoop Barn with a walk-in loft that’s nice for a ceremony or reception. The cottage doubles as a home base for the bridal party on the wedding day (to get ready or hang out a bit) as well as a place for the couple to stay the night of the wedding. The climate-controlled Loft has a deck overlooking the pavilion and surroundings. The pavilion may accommodate up to 250, and it has a climate-controlled kitchen. There are additional outdoor settings to consider for outdoor weddings, both as the location and as a photo backdrop.

The Hopewell Barn is located about 1/2 mile south of the historic Hopewell Church. Built in 1872 and purchased by Deb in 2018, the church is listed on National Historic Register for its ties to Gene Stratton Porter. Gene was a famous author in the early 1900’s and the area of ‘Hopewell’ was used as the locale for the settings for several of her books. The name ‘Rustic Barn at Hopewell’ was selected to pay tribute to historic roots of the Hopewell area.

Willow Acres is a beautifully designed space that is a blank canvas to create an individualized experience that showcases your love and personalities. We strive to create a personal connection with each of our couples to provide a seamless flow throughout the planning process and to ensure that we are a team that you can trust. At the end of the day, we want to bring to life the day that you’ve always dreamed of. After all, you deserve to be a guest at your own event. Our mission is to create a tailor-made experience for each of our clients, whether it be an intimate gathering or a grand affair.

In past traditions, a father of the bride would slip a sixpence into his daughter’s shoe before they would walk down the aisle together. Putting the sixpence stood for good luck and to show that the father wished his daughter prosperity in her marriage. The Silver Coin Wedding & Event Manor is here to create the wedding or event you have always dreamed of. The capability of making your dream a reality is possible here at the venue! The venue has a seating capacity of 200 guests based on floor layout equipped with all year round climate control and indoor restrooms. The venue does hold a 3-way liquor license meaning all alcohol services will be handled through the Silver Coin Wedding & Event Manor. All aspects of the venue are ADA compliant with a designated paved handicap parking area. There is an outdoor patio that is equipped with gas hookups for fire pits and heat lamps. ​

Black Walnut Grove Estate is located on a historic family farm in West College Corner, Indiana just a few minutes west of Oxford, Ohio. This beautiful country estate features a historic 19th-century farmhouse, a rustic timber frame, post and beam constructed barn with hand-hewn wood throughout, and a mid-century two-bedroom guest cabin. Although the house and barn are no longer part of a functioning farm, the current owner has transformed the 11-acre grounds into a cozy and elegant venue, complete with plenty of vintages and rustic charm, for weddings and other events.

Martha's Orchard has been hosting events for the last 15 years. We invite you to experience our unique setting at the orchard. Whether it bee a spring function surrounded by apple trees in full bloom, summer, or fall, you will find few restrictions in creating your perfect venue. We offer a large party barn, with full specialized lighting and state-of-art DJ sound for your reception and your choice of two beautiful wooded areas for your wedding ceremony. Please inquire for a pricing brochure and availability.Our 5000 square foot banquet barn provides ample room for your guest. We can provide enough tables and chairs to accommodate up to 220 guest.

The Freedom Barn at Hope Center Indy is a historic 5,000 square foot, 2 story brick barn tucked away inside the city limits of Indianapolis. Designed for weddings, corporate events, private events, ministry functions and more. The Freedom Barn provides an affordable, romantic blank slate space to build the wedding or event of your dreams while supporting a great cause! With multiple different outdoor wedding backdrops just steps away from The Freedom Barn offers a gazebo, wooded area, and our "slab overlook" surrounded by beautiful wooded surroundings and near a 10,000-square foot greenhouse available for photo ops.

Our expansive property, over 1,000 acres of hills and valleys in beautiful Brown County, offers several unique locations for your bachelor or bachelorette party, rehearsal dinner, wedding, wedding reception, and post-wedding adventures. We work closely with you, helping to create memories that will be cherished for a lifetime. Destination weddings can be stressful, trying to find the perfect caterer, that amazing cake, the photographer who can capture your total experience…etc. We have contacts for all of your wedding needs including spa treatments and activities for the groom. What we don’t have on-site, we can find for you through our extensive list of vendors, proven professionals to meet all of your needs and wish lists.
